index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT
references: Related: CF 281042, CF 278931, Ord 101637. Amending: Ord 103726, Ord 104433.
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Comprehensive Planning Assistance Fund, amending Section 3 of Ordinance 103726 to increase the appropriation made from said Fund and to make the necessary appropriation of other additional monies deposited in said Fund.
